code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Placement.css';import partner1 from'../assets/images/IMG_20210622_141658.jpg';import partner2 from'../assets/images/IMG_20210622_141658.jpg';import partner3 from'../assets/images/IMG20211229130549.jpg';import partner4 from'../assets/images/IMG20211229130356.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const partners=[{img:partner1,name:'Taj Hotels'},{img:partner2,name:'Oberoi Hotels'},{img:partner3,name:'ITC Hotels'},{img:partner4,name:'Radisson Blu'}];function Placement(){const[current,setCurrent]=useState(0);const next=()=>setCurrent((current+1)%partners.length);const prev=()=>setCurrent((current-1+partners.length)%partners.length);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"placement",id:"placement",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Placement Partners"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"placement-carousel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"placement-btn left",onClick:prev,children:"<"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"placement-logo-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:partners[current].img,alt:partners[current].name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"placement-partner-name",children:partners[current].name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"placement-btn right",onClick:next,children:">"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"placement-info",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Our students are placed in leading hotels and hospitality organizations across India."})})]});}export default Placement;
